p: The area under the receiver-operating characteristic (ROC) curve (AUC) was employed in the model performance evaluation [ 44]. The AUC values were between 0 and 1, and higher values indicated better model performance [ 84]. When the AUC was below 0.5, the model performed was worse than chance. Model performance was classified as poor (0.5–0.6), fair (0.6–0.7), good (0.7–0.8), very good (0.8–0.9), or excellent (0.9–1) [ 84].
